billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Requires a maximum water temperature of 120 degrees in any dwelling unit in a one-family, two-family, or multi-family, tenant occupied dwelling
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the multiple dwelling law and the multiple residence law, in relation to preventing scalding burns by requiring safe temperatures for tap water in multiple dwellings and one-family and two-family tenant occupied dwelling units; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to minimum water temperatures
